apps.name: Cercube
apps.subtitle: An elevated YouTube experience.
apps.localizedDescription:
YouTube is one of the best and most popular video-
sharing platform available on the web. It features a range of videos from funny pranks
to reviews, gaming content, and daily vlogs by popular influencers.

YouTube also
offers an app for iOS which provides a more smooth and enjoyable experience watching
videos on your iPhone. Unfortunately, the app lacks a lot of essential
features.

Cercube is a third-party app for YouTube that brings tons of amazing new
features and functionality. Some of these are:

â€¢ Download and save videos up to 4k
resolution
â€¢ Save videos as audio only
â€¢ View, manage and share all your
downloads in Cercube's download manager
â€¢ Block ads
â€¢ Share downloaded videos
with other devices via AirDrop
â€¢ Background playback for streamed and downloaded
videos
â€¢ Import downloads to Music or Videos
â€¢ Play YouTube videos using Picture-
in-Picture mode
â€¢ Downloaded videos are displayed within a beautifully crafted
downloads manager that shows all the available information
â€¢ Choose the default tab
to open when launching YouTube
â€¢ Stream videos in HD on cellular network
â€¢ Auto-
replay videos
â€¢ Hide floating upload button
â€¢ Hide the Trending tab
â€¢ Rewind
or forward videos
â€¢ Cercube options are configurable from within YouTube
settings
â€¢ Play in high quality on Mobile Data

And many more features. All-in-
all, Cercube takes your YouTube experience to a whole new level with all the innovative
features that it provides.

permissions.usageDescription: This lets you upload videos you've already created.

Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help
you find friends to share videos with.

This lets you include audio with your videos and search
using your voice.

Makes it easier for you to attach location information
to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved
recommendations and ads.

apps.name: Deezer++
apps.subtitle: Mix your music your way.
apps.versionDescription:
The design of the "Share options" sub-menu has been
updated for easier navigation.

There is now a trash bin icon next to "Recent
searches" in the Search tab that lets you clear your recent search history.

We've
revamped the look of the Flow card on the My Music tab.
apps.localizedDescription:
Your life deserves its own soundtrack. With 56 million
tracks, playlists and podcasts plus personalized recommendations just for you, Deezer
is your music companion. A music player that always gives you the songs you love, and
helps you discover your next favorites. You bring the passion, we bring the
music.

Enjoy best-in-class features with the Deezer music player:

â€¢ Stream the
biggest global hits
â€¢ 56 million songs to discover and enjoy
â€¢ Lean back and find
new tracks with Shuffle Mode
â€¢ Get personalized recommendations and explore new
music styles with Flow
â€¢ Listen to any playlist you want or create your own
â€¢ Add
the tracks you love to your music collection in a single tap with Favorites
â€¢
Organise your new music by artist or genre
â€¢ Share your personal playlists and
favorite tracks with others
â€¢ Discover podcasts, radio stations, and audio
channels

What do you get for free with Deezer++:

â€¢ No ads
â€¢ Offline Mode:
download your favorite tracks or podcasts and listen to offline music anywhere
â€¢
Unlimited skips
â€¢ No song shuffling
â€¢ Superior Sound Quality (320 kBps)
â€¢
Music player is compatible with Amazon Alexa and connected devices

permissions.usageDescription: Deezer needs to access your photos.
Deezer needs to access your camera.

Assistant devices.
This will be used to improve music recommendations.

apps.name: Spotify++
apps.subtitle: Spotify with free premium.
apps.localizedDescription:
Spotify++ essentially activates spotify premium on your
device with one exception: No downloads.

So what does Spotify++ change?

â€¢ All
kinds of ads removed
â€¢ Unlimited skips
â€¢ Play any song or album
â€¢ Enable
extreme streaming quality
â€¢ No forced shuffle
â€¢ Import songs from the Music app

apps.name: Twitter++
apps.subtitle: Clean, ad-free Twitter.
apps.localizedDescription:
Adds new features to the iOS Twitter app:

â€¢ Share
images and links from tweets by long pressing on them
â€¢ Share tweets to third-party
apps with a tap and hold gesture
â€¢ Save video and GIFs to your device with tap and
hold gesture
â€¢ Download YouTube videos from Twitter to your device
â€¢ Set the
default browser to open when a link is tapped
â€¢ Show the keyboard on Compose instead
of media screen
â€¢ Automatic Long Tweet Creation - For tweets that are over 140
Chars, Twitter++ allows you to automatically post tweet as an image or using
pastebin.
â€¢ Displays a confirmation when favoriting a Tweet
â€¢ Enable full-screen

â€¢ Video tweets of users who have blocked you

permissions.usageDescription:

add them to your tweet.

Enables Twitter to take photos and videos and add them
to your tweet.
Enables twitter to share music.

Enables Twitter to search your address book for people

Enables Twitter to take videos with audio and add them

apps.name: Paperback
apps.subtitle: An ad-free manga reader for iOS.
apps.versionDescription:
First public release!

Changelog
â€¢ Tag and Advanced
search are not limited 50 manga anymore
â€¢ Fixed refresh button in follows not doing
anything
â€¢ Removed Fancy Paged reader

Known Issues
â€¢ Crashes upon queueing
download, reinstall app to fix it
â€¢ Sorting by Recently Updated in Follows view
doesn't respect user's selected languages, this cannot be fixed, it's how MD works
apps.localizedDescription:
Paperback is a fully ad-free manga reader for iOS 13 and
iPadOS 13.4 and up.

iPad support
â€¢ Friendly layout with a robust double spread
chapter reader for iPad.

MangaDex integration
â€¢ Paperback will sync your mangas
and settings to and from MangaDex.

No advertisements
â€¢ Unlike other not-to-be-
named apps and websites, this is a fully ad-free experience.

If you enjoy the app,
please support the developer on Patreon to get access to the beta version of the app:
https://www.patreon.com/FaizanDurrani

PopcornTimeTV uses online torrents to find and stream

select the quality and subtitles
â€¢ Instant streaming or downloads
â€¢ Trakt.tv
scrobbling and watchlist syncing

type.name: Instagram Rocket
type.subtitle: An app crafted with love by Instagram users.
type.localizedDescription:
The Much-Awaited App

Rocket for Instagram could be
categorized as an Instagram userâ€TMs dream tweak, because itâ€TMs going to let you do
things that the photo and video sharing social network probably doesnâ€TMt want you to
do, but nevertheless theyâ€TMre things you, the user, have wanted for a long time.
Rocket not only gives you the features that are missing from Instagram, but it also
gives you full control over the app.

If youâ€TMre an Instagram user looking to
enhance your abilities within the app and obtain features that no stock user is ever
going to get, Rocket for Instagram could be your new best friend.

Amazing
Features:

- Browse home feed in grid layout.
- Show following status in Profile.
-
Download posts from your feed.
- Repost any post from your feed.
- Long press on
posts to zoom.
- Copy post captions from your feed.
- Download all Stories on
Instagram.
- Save videos from IGTV.
- View Stories without notifying others.
- Mute
and unmute Stories.
- Disable Auto-Advance in Stories.
- Hide Stories from your
feed.
- Play in high quality on Mobile Data.
- Long press on profile photo to
zoom.
- Disable read receipts in DM.
- Disable Screenshot notifications in DM.
-
Disable Read Receipts in DM.
